page.title: 09CHANGES AT IVYLEAF FARM
page.content: Mr Ed Stanbury who owns Ivyleaf Farm has kept an{aerial photographic record of which enable farm changes to be plotted.In the early 1950's the farm consisted of the farmhouse and a quadrangle of barns and stores.On the north side of the quadrangle was a second row of stores. By the early 1970's the southern part of the quadrangle had been removed and a modern barn built.In front of this a garage was also built. In the next 10 years the farm expanded and a new large barn was constructed in the small field north of the main block. The rest of this field was excavated and a silage store made. Through all of the 30 years the south facing garden has remained the same.
